title: Frederica faces uncertain QB play against Bethesda
content:
In just one week, a great deal changed for Frederica’s football team. 
  
The Knights (2-1) suffered their first loss of the season, which had its pros and cons. But the biggest cons certainly came from the players’ lost due to injury in the contest. Standout senior playmaker Hollis Veal suffered a concussion, and due to protocol, he won’t be able to go against Bethesda today.
